meanings.sent1: Aerobiologies help us understand tiny living things in the air.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use aerobiologies to learn about microbes floating in the atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The aerobiologies class had fun collecting samples of air for their research project.
meanings.sent4: Exploring aerobiologies is like uncovering a hidden world of airborne creatures.
meanings.sent5: The field of aerobiologies reveals the secret life of microscopic organisms in the sky.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of the biological particles in the air.
meanings.sent1: Studying aerobiologies helps us discover the tiny things in the atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use aerobiologies to investigate the biological components of the air.
meanings.sent3: During the aerobiologies experiment, the students found pollen grains in the air filter.
meanings.sent4: Aerobiologies is like solving a puzzle of the living particles floating around us.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of aerobiologies lies in unraveling the mysteries of airborne life forms.
